titles.title: CATRA Act of 2020
CATRA Act of 2020
Center for Asymmetric Threat Research and Analytics Act of 2020

To direct the Secretary of Defense to establish the Center for Asymmetric Threat Research and Analytics to conduct research countering violent extremist organizations, weapons of mass destruction, and influence operations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Center for Asymmetric Threat Research and Analytics Act of 2020 or the CATRA Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Defense to establish the Center for Asymmetric Threat Research and Analytics to counter terrorism, extremism, and other threats through activities including research, training, and education.
